TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerOptionService/DesignerOptionCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 包含设计器选项的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of designer options.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个包含其他集合对象。The class is a collection that contains other objects. 此窗体的选项，具有每个分支具有一个名称和可能的属性集合的树的树。This forms a tree of options, with each branch of the tree having a name and a possible collection of properties. 树的每个父分支都包含的所有子分支的属性的联合。Each parent branch of the tree contains a union of the properties of all the child branches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象，将直接从传递给值方法，并且包装在隐藏用户中的值对象的其他属性描述符。 objects are taken directly from the value passed to the method and are wrapped in an additional property descriptor that hides the value object from the user. 这意味着任何值都可以传递到`component`的各种参数方法。This means that any value may be passed into the `component` parameter of the various methods. 值将无法识别，并且将内部替换正确的值。The value is not recognized and is replaced with the correct value internally.
